sentences.sentence: When I think of my life, this is the time I like to think of.
sentences.translation: 当我回想这一生，这是我喜欢回忆起的时刻。

sentences.sentence: If you are always trying to be normal, you will never know how amazing you can be.
sentences.translation: 你若总想平平凡凡，就永远不知道自己能有多出色。

sentences.sentence: The world's full of lonely people afraid to make the first move.
sentences.translation: 这个世界上尽是些害怕迈出第一步的孤独之人。

sentences.sentence: If you want something in life, reach and grab it.
sentences.translation: 如果确定自己想要什么，那就努力争取吧。

sentences.sentence: Everyone can be better and better if he has a dream and tries his best to realize the dream.
sentences.translation: 每一个人都会越来越好，只要他拥有一个梦想并为此不断地努力。
